mapper.select: SELECT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, si.ranking, sr.main_lane, si.wins, si.lose, si.games FROM summoner_info si JOIN summoner_ranking sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name JOIN RECORD r ON si.summoner_name = r.summoner_name WHERE r.game_mode = 'solo_rank' ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name JOIN RECORD r ON si.summoner_name = r.summoner_name WHERE r.game_mode = 'flex_rank' ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_name1, sr.most_champ_name2, sr.most_champ_name3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name ORDER BY si.s_level DESC;
